title: Amanda Platell for The Daily Mail
text: Of late, no posh girl worth her pink Himalyan salt has stepped out without a £300 piece of croissant-shaped fabric (prices can rise to an eye-watering £900) atop their shining heads, says AMANDA PLATELL as she discusses the powerband, the crowning glory of the society set. CAMILLA RIDLEY-DAY also hails the fashion must-have. Chunkier than an Alice band, it's wide enough to cover any unsightly roots and can deal with all sorts of bad hair days, especially rainy ones, she says. From left to right: The Duchess of Cambridge, Princess Beatrice, Cressida Bonas, Carrie Symonds and Georgia Toffolo.
